knimeNode.name: Shuffle
knimeNode.shortDescription: Shuffles the rows of the input tables.

fullDescription.intro: It shuffles the rows of the input tables such that they are in random order.
fullDescription.option: Enter a seed for the random number generator. Entering a seed will cause the node to shuffle the same input data always the same way (e.g. if you reset and execute the node). Disable this option to have always a different seed, i.e. real randomness.

ports.dataIn: Input table with the rows that should be shuffled.
